A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've enjoyed every Star Wars movie\, even ones that were considered not so great (prequels). Likewise\, I enjoyed this movie...I think? I'm still weighing it out. Overall it just never really 'kicked-in' for me. Felt like it was building towards some amazing crescendo\, but it never delivered. Kylo Ren is so wishy-washy and it's really getting to a point where it's like\, dude\, just pick a side already! The effects are awesome. The music is amazing. I love seeing some familiar characters.  But it just fell flat for me. And the humor was a bit too much in this episode. It was overused and not necessary. In fact it took away from certain scenes because it was used. I have no real desire to see this one again. And that's rare for a Star Wars movie. Hoping for better next time\, but I still love Star Wars!
